1351990.name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr - Charybdis Outpost
1351990.description:
"The Imperial Frigate “Annihilation” has picked up a vox transmission from an Imperial installation named Charybdis Outpost. The complex is listed in the archives as a mass prisoner processing centre, which was lost in a Warpsurge for a long time. The message itself is quite perplexing, as it seems to be a call for redemption through righteous death, sent by a group of heretics.

Sinners asking to be purged? This clearly merits investigation."

In this exclusive mission, unravel the secrets of the Charybdis holding centre as you make your way through unique environments and experience brutal combat against an unknown enemy.
1351990.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 匈牙利语, 韩语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 日语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
